snippet.title: Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits Volume 2 - Sega Dreamcast - Arcade showcase all titles [1080p 60fps]
snippet.description:
A US exclusive release Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits Volume 2 is an arcade retro collection containing the following six arcade titles, 720 Degrees, Gauntlet, Moon Patrol, Paperboy, Rampage & Spy Hunter. A far more attractive collection than the first volume with a better selection of games. Gauntlet & Rampage fans will be at home with this on it's also a rare console outing for Moon Patrol. The emulation is decent enough and the game gives you access to a number of options for each title. However Digital Eclipse weren't known for doing great retro collections. For this video we take a look at all six titles included in the collection.

Release: 2001
Developer: Digital Eclipse
Publisher: Midway
Format: Sega Dreamcast (DC) / ドリームキャスト

ミッドウェイゲームズ の最大 のアーケードは、第2巻ベスト盤は、日本で発売されなかったヒット

Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits Volume 2 is not available on any other format, but many of the games included in this collection have been released on other midway collections.

Randomised Gaming blog: http://randomisedgaming.tumblr.com  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rdmdgaming 

All footage in this video is captured directly from the Sega Dreamcast console, via an Elgato Game Capture HD60 Pro using a VGA to HDMI upscaler.
